overview: Vivian and Chris have taken a much needed vacation to reinvigorate their marriage. The resort is everything they hoped for - tropical, sunny, and relaxing. However, things are not what they seem when the couple discovers other vacationers exhibiting very flirtatious and comfortable behavior towards them. Come to find out - this is no ordinary resort, but rather a hot wifing resort where wives can bring their dirtiest fantasies to life. But, will Vivian and Chris risk their marriage for an exploration of hidden desires or...will they leave only wondering what all these couples seem so happy about?
title: The Hot Wives 5
